title.jp: Ore ga Imouto to Koi wo Suru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: After bumping into his little sister, Kirino, in the hall, Kyōsuke Kōsaka finds a magical girl anime DVD which contains a little-sister themed adult game inside. Kyōsuke soon learns the game belongs to Kirino and confronts her about it.

title.jp: Ore ga Imouto to Off-Kai ni Iku Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Noticing Kirino has no one to share her hobbies with, Kyōsuke asks for advice from his friend, Manami Tamura, who suggests that she make some otaku friends.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kirino hangs out with Saori and Kuroneko again and is surprised to find that they do not have to worry about hiding their hobbies.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Natsu-Comi Toka Iku Wake ga Nai

synopsis: When Kirino forces Kyōsuke to play a beat-em-up eroge, he asks Saori for some playing advice.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto no Shinyuu ga Konnani XX na Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kirino's best friend Ayase, finds out that she likes eroge.

title.jp: Ore no Osananajimi ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Manami invites Kyōsuke over to her house to try out some sweets made by her family's shop for a Halloween event.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Shousetsuka na Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kirino drags Kyōsuke around the city on Christmas Eve.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Anime-ka na Wake ga Nai

synopsis: While Kirino's novel becomes increasingly popular, her editor reveals that it may be adapted into an anime.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Eroge Sanmai na Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kirino gets a long awaited adult game in the post and spends the entire day playing it.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Cosplay na Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Ayase asks Kyōsuke to give her advice on a present she can give Kirion to make up with her.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Maid na Wake ga Nai

synopsis: After running into her at the supermarket, Kyōsuke invites Manami over to his house to help him make lunch.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto no Jinsei Soudan ga Kore de Owaru Wake ga Nai: Good End♡

synopsis: Kirino uses her final life counseling session to ask Kyōsuke to buy her an adult game that is launching at midnight in Akihabara.
